item.description:
WHERE: The Public House
Sturbridge Ma

WHEN: Thursday, October 25

TIME: 6-10pm

COST: $49.00
(includes Historic Public House Dinner)

Enjoy dinner and dessert Public House style. Then, journey with Gary McKinstry,Medium, Psychic, Clairvoyant for 2 hours of channeled 'CONNECTIONS' with past lives.
There are no guarantees of a connection for everyone in the room, however his special ability as the receiver may allow some individuals to achieve a connection with a loved one. At the end of the evening Gary welcomes questions.

NOTE* Reservations are needed for this event. IT IS A PRE-PAID EVENT, so you would need to phone the Public House and reserve in order to attend (make sure you check their cancellation policy- THERE ARE NO CANCELLATIONS FOR THIS EVENT) There will be no reserved seating arrangements, although they will make a note that the group will sit together. When you phone, please ask them to add that you will be with "JO/ MEETUP GROUP." I have posted this event on other meetup group calendars.. it's a weeknight so I am not sure how many will be able to attend. ALSO, if you are interested in carpooling, please add it to your RSVP along with your location.

HISTORIC PUBLIC HOUSE DINNER
*Cash Bar & international cheese Display
*Public House Bakery basket
*New England Clam Chowder
*Roast Turkey with Cornbread Sausage Stuffing
*Fresh Cranberry Sauce
*Pan Gravy
*Mashed Potatoes
*Deep Dish Apple Pies with Vanilla Ice Cream
Coffee & Tea
Dinner & Connections event: $49.00 pp
(tax & gratuity not included)
Reservations: 508-347-3313
item.name: CONNECTIONS- Gary McKinstry, Psychic, Medium & Clairvoynat
